request.description: This endpoint enables users with admin role to sign in
This endpoint enables users with admin role to log out
This endpoint enables users with content role to sign in
This endpoint enables users with content role to log out

item.name: Return an empty response simply to trigger the storage of the CSRF cookie in the browser.

header.value: XSRF-%3D; expires=Sat, 25 May 2024 17:21:23 GMT; Max-Age=7200; path=/; samesite=lax; laravel_%3D; expires=Sat, 25 May 2024 17:21:23 GMT; Max-Age=7200; path=/; httponly; samesite=lax

request.description: This endpoint redirect to the LinkedIn SignIn Form
This endpoint sign in the users with LinkedIn Account

request.description: This endpoint list all blog post from newest ones to the oldest.Additionally you may use ?title= query param to filter by title

response.body: {"data":[{"title":"Voluptatem omnis doloremque omnis sunt sunt rem.","slug":"voluptatem-omnis-doloremque-omnis-sunt-sunt-rem","excerpt":"Consequatur quis quo unde officiis.","tags":[{"name":"php"},{"name":"laravel"},{"name":"react"}],"publish_date":"2024-05-15","author":{"first_name":"Hettie Swaniawski","last_name":"Shields","image":null}},{"title":"Deserunt omnis similique quia fugit similique rerum repellendus eum.","slug":"deserunt-omnis-similique-quia-fugit-similique-rerum-repellendus-eum","excerpt":"Rem quo numquam consequatur blanditiis fugit.","tags":[{"name":"php"},{"name":"laravel"},{"name":"react"}],"publish_date":"2024-05-15","author":{"first_name":"Elinore Gutkowski","last_name":"Gusikowski","image":null}},{"title":"Omnis eligendi tempore ut sed numquam eaque qui.","slug":"omnis-eligendi-tempore-ut-sed-numquam-eaque-qui","excerpt":"Eaque vitae assumenda ut mollitia sapiente.","tags":[{"name":"php"},{"name":"laravel"},{"name":"react"}],"publish_date":"2024-05-15","author":{"first_name":"Lorna Mitchell DVM","last_name":"Morissette","image":null}}],"links":{"first":"http:\/\/localhost\/blog-posts?page=1","last":"http:\/\/localhost\/blog-posts?page=1","prev":null,"next":null},"meta":{"current_page":1,"from":1,"last_page":1,"links":[{"url":null,"label":"« Previous","active":false},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/blog-posts?page=1","label":"1","active":true},{"url":null,"label":"Next »","active":false}],"path":"http:\/\/localhost\/blog-posts","per_page":15,"to":3,"total":3}}

variable.description: The slug of the blog post.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves blog post by a slug.
This endpoint list all blog post tags in alphabetically order paginated by 20.
This endpoint retrieves blog posts by a specific tag.
This endpoint is used for submitting contact form data.

This endpoint is for subscribing to Leanhub.mk.
 Additionally it uses Cloudflare Turnstile ReCaptcha for validation.
